p: A blood sample (maximum of 21 mL) will be obtained from all willing participants, processed in the National Institute for Health Research (NIHR) Wellcome Trust Clinical Research Facility lab and stored at −80°C pending further analysis. All respiratory samples leftover from FilmArray testing may be frozen and stored for further study. Participant consent for this is included in the consent form. Patients may be approached for additional samples to be collected and stored for further study (see next for schedule of additional samples).
